ARABIC: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدْهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادًا كَبِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So do not obey the kafirun but use this to battle against them with all your might.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So do not listen to unbelievers, and strive against them with greater effort.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So, O Prophet, do not yield to the disbelievers, but wage a Jihad against them with this Qur'an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Do not yield to the unbelievers but launch a great campaign against them with the help of the Quran.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So do not listen to the disbelievers and, with this Qur’an, fight a great war against them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So obey not the disbelievers, but strive against them with the utmost endeavor with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So do not follow the unbelievers, and strive against them a mighty striving with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So obey not the unbelievers, but struggle with them thereby mightily.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So obey not the disbelievers, but strive against them herewith with a great endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so do not yield to those who deny the truth, but strive with the utmost strenuousness by means of this [Quran, to convey its message to them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Se obey not thou the infidels, but strive against them therewith with a great striving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not obey the faithless, but wage a great jihad against them with it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Therefore listen not to the Unbelievers, but strive against them with the utmost strenuousness, with the (Qur'an).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So obey not the disbelievers, but strive against them (by preaching) with the utmost endeavour, with it (the Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So do not obey the unbelievers, but struggle mightily with it (the Koran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So do not obey the disbelievers, but strive against them with it, a mighty struggle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So do not obey the disbelievers, and strive against them with the Qur'an a great striving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:52] So do not obey the disbelievers, in their desires, but struggle against them therewith, that is, through [adherence to] the Qur’ān, with a great endeavour.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So obey not the disbelievers) Abu Jahl and his host regarding hat which they ask of you, (but strive against them herewith) by means of the Qur'an (with a great endeavour) by the sword.
